Introduction
This topic contains information on the responsibilities of the PMC for the review and development of VA pension-related home loans, including
PMC action and response based on RLC income and net worth information
, and
end product (EP) credit based on PMC reviews of RLC information
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section B - Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Pension-Related Home Loans
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section B
